title: Can't remember this script face
content:
I know it but i can’t put a name on it now.

Any idea?

dr

author: David R

comments.content:
- hey David, this is Wrexham.

- Oh hey, thanks man!

dr
never heard of Wrexham. Looks like a mangled Monotype Script to me.

and indeed you are right, wrexham is a rip-off on dafont.com.

shame on me, and thank you.

dr
Monotype Script has been ripped more than once. There’s a grunged MT Script on dafont as well. We’ve received more than one amusing request for a “clean” version of that one.
